Title: Wind and snow in the Dabie Mountains
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The poster represents Deng Xiaoping and Liu Bocheng in the Dabie Mountains in the winter of 1947, awaiting their march onwards in the civil war against the Guomindang. The Dabie Mountains are located in central China, forming the main watershed between the Huai and Yangzi rivers, marking the boundary between Hubei Province and neighboring Henan and Anhui.
